attributes.action: Make GP'S see patients face to face
attributes.additional_details: People are not getting to see there GP'S putting more pressure on our hospitals
attributes.background: Make GP'S see more patients face to face

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Decisions on when to offer a face to face, as opposed to a remote, consultation are an operational decision for GPs and NHS Trusts.

Find out more:
https://www.rcgp.org.uk/covid-19/general-practice-is-open.aspx
